meanings.definition: More cheerful in mood or disposition.
meanings.sent1: She felt cheerfuller after receiving a compliment.
meanings.sent2: The sun shining made the day even cheerfuller.
meanings.sent3: His cheerful singing made the birds seem cheerfuller too.
meanings.sent4: Her smile was like a cheerfuller rainbow after the rain.
meanings.sent5: The cheerful puppy made the room even cheerfuller.

meanings.sent1: She greeted everyone cheerfuller than usual.
meanings.sent2: The children played cheerfuller in the park.
meanings.sent3: He danced cheerfuller than a jumping bean.
meanings.sent4: The flowers bloomed cheerfuller after the rain.
meanings.sent5: The music played cheerfuller as the party went on.
